title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Utilizing Ontology Alignment Techniques for Higher Education Quality Management

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of mathematical education systems, basic quality management concepts, and foundational ontology knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Explain the relationship between higher education quality management standards and ontology alignment techniques
Design a mathematics education quality indicator system using an ontology structure
Use ontology alignment tools to analyze compatibility between educational standards and propose integration strategies
Develop a quality management model applicable to real educational institutions through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
